moves.name: Thunder Fang
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of making the target flinch or leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: Electric Terrain
moves.effect: Turns the field into Electric Terrain.

moves.name: Make Some Sparks!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Attack. Ensures that the user’s next attack will be a critical hit. When the field is Electric Terrain, raises the accuracy of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Wild Charge
moves.effect: The user also takes 20% of the damage it dealt to the target.

syncMove.name: Star Shock Thunder Fang
syncMove.description: This move’s power increases if the target is paralyzed.

passives.name: Hostile Environment 4
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.

passives.name: Aggravation 4
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting the flinching, confused, or trapped condition with the additional effects of moves.

passives.name: Terrify 1
passives.description: Lowers the Attack of all opposing sync pairs when the Pokémon enters a battle.
